==Chinese==
{{zh-forms|s=高良姜|alt=高莨薑|delink=1|type=21}}

===Etymology===
First element is from {{zh-l|高涼|''ancient placename in China''}}, with {{zh-l|*涼|cold}} changed to its homophone {{zh-l|*良|good}}.

===Pronunciation===
{{zh-pron
|m=gāoliángjiāng
|c=gou1 loeng4 goeng1
|cat=n
}}

===Noun===
{{zh-noun}}

# {{lb|zh|TCM}} [[rhizome]] of the [[galangal]]. (An [[herb]] used in [[traditional Chinese medicine]] as an antibiotic; to warm the stomach, and to improve digestion.)
